title: Add CI security scanning workflow
description: Create .github/workflows/security.yml that runs dependency vulnerability scans (e.g., npm audit or snyk/OSS scanners), container/static-analysis tools, and a job to run the test suite. Configure to run on PRs and main merges.
acceptanceCriteria: A workflow file exists at .github/workflows/security.yml that triggers on pull_request and push to main, runs dependency vulnerability checks and the test matrix, and reports failures in CI.
